short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension of chrome to help me backup all of my favorite novels on truyenyy or any other website quickly and conveniently !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Help download novel on truyenyy & more other platforms (coming soon).
Note: You need to pay for your novel first, there is no way to download the novel that you have not paid. :)
If you want to download paid novel on truyenyy or any other platforms for free, this is not the tool for you, you can only download what you paid.
